description.en: An open, extensible, wiki for your team built using React and Node.js.
description.fr: Un wiki open source et évolutif pour votre équipe, conçu avec React et Node.js

install.name: dex_domain
install.ask: Domain for authentification. It can't be the same domain as above. Dex app will be installed and used for the authentification mechanism

install.name: dex_path
install.ask: Path for authentification url. Please don't use 'auth' as it will break Nginx configuration

install.name: minio_domain
install.ask: Domain for MinIO app, used for images and attachements storage. If not yet installed, it will automatically be. Minio has to be installed at the root

install.name: minio_admin
install.ask: Admin for MinIO app, used for images and attachements storage. Please note that if MinIO is already installed, that setting won't be used

install.name: minio_password
install.ask: Domain for MinIO app, used for images and attachements storage. Please note that if MinIO is already installed, that setting won't be used
